header_text: You sent an email to your department a few hours ago, asking for responses on a topic. You check to see who's responded and notice that your boss hasn't responded yet. You think about how your boss didn't read the email from you and you feel sad.

elements.text: You look at who did respond, and notice other coworkers have given their input. When you think about your boss not responding yet, you are...

elements.name: You sent an email to your department a few hours ago, asking for responses on a topic. You check to see who's responded and notice that your boss hasn't responded yet. You think about how your boss didn't read the email from you and you feel sad._Work/Career Development_entry2
